title: _USB_DEVICE_CHARACTERISTICS (usbioctl.h)
description: Contains information about the USB deviceâ€™s characteristics, such as the maximum send and receive delays for any request. This structure is used in the IOCTL_USB_GET_DEVICE_CHARACTERISTICS request.
